I pushed a version having a @Group for a test class or method containi=
ng only a single value for the group name. 

The suite is annotated with ei=
ther @IncludeGroups or @ExcludeGroups.

    @Exclud=
eGroups("b")
    @...({TestWithGroupOnClassAndMethod.class})=

    }

     @GroupFilter({"a", =
